resources.string: Note: These are the most current schedules as of January 4, 2014. They\'re effective throughout the school year. Vist the PVTA website for the most up-to-date information regarding weather conditions and route changes.

Made to be an up-to-date informational app for UMass Amherst students, providing listings for everything from delivery places to restaurants up to cab listings. Offline bus schedules as well as the campus map are also available.
Jason D, Computer Science \'15 student at UMass Amherst
